name: PromptToProduct Schema
description: Schema for interpreting developer prompts and mapping them to spec-driven actions.

create_epic.description: Creates a new Epic markdown file under specs/epics/
create_epic.example_prompt: Create an epic for enabling cross-agent communication

create_feature.description: Creates a new Feature markdown file linked to an Epic.
create_feature.example_prompt: Add a feature to automate prompt categorization under Epic E001

create_story.description: Creates a new Story markdown file linked to a Feature.
create_story.example_prompt: Add a story to set up prompt validation under Feature F001

update_spec.description: Updates an existing spec (epic/feature/story) with new content or links.
update_spec.example_prompt: Update feature F001 to include data lineage tracking

validate_links.example_prompt: Check if all stories are linked to a valid feature
